document.full_text: libyan students are using mobile phones, an amateur video camera and youtube to offer a glimpse of the war in the besieged city of misrata where journalists are prevented from reporting freely.
document.title: students use cameras, youtube to reveal misrata siege
lines_and_colors: libyan students are using mobile phones, an amateur video camera and youtube to offer a glimpse of the war in the besieged city of misrata where journalists are prevented from reporting freely.
